questions.question: Coefficient of discharge for a given orifice is a function of ________________ and __________________ for orificemeter?

answers.c: Both Orifice Reynolds number and β ratio

questions.question: Permanent pressure loss is _______________ in the case venturimeter  as compared to of orificemeter?
The pressure drop across the orifice ___________________  when the rate of flow increases.
Flange taps for the orifice meter are located at

answers.a: immediately adjacent to the plate faces, upstream and downstream
answers.b: 2½ pipe diameters upstream and 8 pipe diameters downstream
answers.c: one inch from the upstream face of the orifice plate and one inch from the downstream face
answers.d: One pipe diameter(D) on upstream side and D/2 on down stream side

questions.question: Orificemeter can be used for measuring the flow rate of
